function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Compact development and densification bringing people together","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious infectious diseases transmission","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene and sanitation measures, promoting vaccination, and regulating crowd sizes","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration systems, contactless technologies, and real-time crowd monitoring","People":"Population living in compact development areas","Owner":"Local government and city planners"},{"Description":"High reliance on private vehicles and low support for public transit","Impact":"Limited access to active transportation and higher risk of chronic diseases","Mitigation":"Investing in public transit infrastructure, promoting active transportation, and implementing policies to reduce vehicle dependence","Technologies":"Smart transit systems, bike-sharing platforms, and urban planning software","People":"Residents in areas with low support for public transit","Owner":"Transportation authorities and urban planners"},{"Description":"Lack of compact transit-oriented development","Impact":"Limited access to public transit and increased reliance on private vehicles","Mitigation":"Encouraging mixed-use development, promoting transit-oriented design, and implementing policies to support compact development","Technologies":"GIS mapping tools, urban design software, and smart growth principles","People":"Residents in areas with limited access to public transit","Owner":"Urban planners and developers"}]}
